name: Aut Labs Plugin
description: this is a description of the Open Task type

module.title: Task
module.shortDescription: A blank canvas for you to design your own Task type, with manual validation of submissions being required.
module.longDescription: This one's up to you, make it yours. Request links to artwork, written creations, or anything you want really. This task requires manual validation so you maintain full control over what's approved.
